&lt;br&gt;'''Notes and Examples'''
&lt;p&gt;The colors can include an alpha channel value for transparency.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Setting '''pen''' to '''off''' will disable the pen color to fully transparent.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;code&gt;&lt;pre&gt;
line-width 3
pen yellow
box 20x20 200x200
pen off
fill-pen blue
box 50x50 250x250
pen logo.gif
fill-pen off
box 100x100 300x300
&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/code&gt;
